synopsis.text: Takeshi is an unlucky high school student who has been cursed with misfortune his whole life due to his father's wish. After a series of particularly unfortunate events, the angel Elle is sent by God to protect Takeshi and bring some happiness into his life. Elle has the ability to become human, so she moves in with Takeshi, his aunt Sanae, his cousin Motoko, and his friends. Together, they have lighthearted adventures and work to counteract Takeshi's bad luck curse. Though initially annoyed by Elle's presence, Takeshi grows to accept her help and companionship. With her angelic powers and bright personality, Elle strives to shield Takeshi from harm and make up for his lifetime of misfortune. Even through challenging situations, the pair faces Takeshi's curse of bad luck together with the support of their makeshift family.
